congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Amending title 5, United States Code, to provide for an annuity supplement for certain air traffic controllers
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 5785, to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for an annuity supplement for certain air traffic controllers, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 399 yeas to 4 nays, Roll No. 522;

congVote.result: Three-fifths of the Senators duly chosen and sworn having voted in the affirmative, the motion is agreed to.
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Senate continued consideration of the motion to proceed to consideration of H.R. 5325, making appropriations for the Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2017.<P/>During consideration of this measure today, Senate also took the following action:<P/>By 89 yeas to 7 nays (Vote No. 144), three-fifths of those Senators duly chosen and sworn, having voted in the affirmative, Senate agreed to the motion to close further debate on the motion to proceed to consideration of the bill.
